remarks: The base set of a constructed star ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
srngfn.r $e |- R = ( { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. , <. ( .r ` ndx ) , .x. >. } u. { <. ( *r ` ndx ) , .* >. } ) $.
srngbase $p |- ( B e. X -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
